name: places/ChIJwzshOANZwokRIDf8azA5u98
adrFormatAddress: 1148 5th Ave #1b, New York, NY 10128-0807, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Gulati was very highly recommended. I can not tell you how disappointed I am with my experience. I am a doctor myself and usually do not wright reviews but feel obligated to do so. This office and Dr. Gulati do not follow up or care about there patients. After initial consultation and a lot of blood work I was suppose to get a RX and follow up conversation about results of my tests. No one did anything for 3 weeks. After many phone calls to the office I finally got a phone call from Dr. Gulati who informed me that I need more blood work and need to come back for another appointment. This office do not except any insurance and ny initial visit cost about 800 dollars, that would not be a problem if I would get standard of care you expect from a office on 5 Ave. I keep calling my pharmacy hoping to get a Rx that was initially recommended. But no one send anything from this office. As a doctor who see patients every day I am in shock that some one can practice medicine with such a confusion and not coming through and charge this amount of money . Another point I would like to make that Dr. Gulati does not like to hear what you have to say she just talk and talk and creat complete confusion , I was hoping after blood work was done she actually would make any sense but no . This office waisted my valuable time and my money !!!!

originalText.text: When I met Dr. Gulati, I had been suffering from aches, pains and digestive discomfort for over 20 years.  Within three months of working with Dr. Gulati, these symptoms have disappeared.  She has helped me understand why I was not feeling well and what steps I need to take to get my health back.  I feel great!

text.text: When I met Dr. Gulati, I had been suffering from aches, pains and digestive discomfort for over 20 years.  Within three months of working with Dr. Gulati, these symptoms have disappeared.  She has helped me understand why I was not feeling well and what steps I need to take to get my health back.  I feel great!

originalText.text: Dr rashmi is a very knowledgeable doctor, who understands your problem right away. I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism and went to many doctors before but was not improved until I came to her. The protocol she gave me changed my life and I feel so much better now .

text.text: Dr rashmi is a very knowledgeable doctor, who understands your problem right away. I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism and went to many doctors before but was not improved until I came to her. The protocol she gave me changed my life and I feel so much better now .

originalText.text: I would not recommend. Every time I met with her I was talked down to and rushed through an appointment.  Everything is focused on thyroid no matter what your issues are. She gives you a plan and then changes it a week later over the phone.  She does not appear to understand how diet plays a role in health either. The admin aspects are never easy. Email always fails and you have to call several times to get something done. I kept ending up with crazy charges from labs and the offices response was always "don't worry."  This office is not worth your money. Stay away.

originalText.text: Dr . Gulati is worth every single penny paid.  After seeing her I believe she is one of the most informed women in medicine.  She blends the science of  allopathic, hollistic and integrative beautifully.  I am in good hands now ! So blessed !
